name: WP to GHTime
author: Guy Halford-Thompson

sections.description:
You can now use this plugin to increase your SEO! The GHTime service now provides a link back to your blog whenever a new code is created. Since all the GHTime codes are indexed with Google, this will provide crucial backlinks to your site which will increase your rankings on Google and other search engines.
This plugin is essential for anyone wishing to protect their intellectual property.
The Wp to GHTime plugin allows you to protect your intellectual property by using a GHTime Data Protector Code to timestamp each post for you. The GHTime code is displayed at the bottom of each post and can be verified by clicking on the code.
Each code is unique and provides proof that the information contained in each of your blog posts belongs to you.
sections.installation:
1. Use the built-in installer to install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can edit the settings by going to the GHTime Options page
  4. Your intellectual property is now secure!
sections.faq:
How will this plugin increase my Google rankings?

The GHTime service provides a link back to your blog every time you create a new post. These ‘backlinks’ increase your Google rankings.

What is a GHTime Data Protector Code?

A GHTime Data Protector Code is a 5 character code which links an author to some data. The code provides proof that the data was created before a certain date and allows authors to protect their intellectual property.
